ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would highly recommend this class to anyone who will be using microscopy in their research. It not only taught me about the techniques I was interested in using, but it exposed me to techniques that I had never heard of and may consider in the future.
Excellent overview of the various microscopy technologies out there. I would highly recommend the course to anyone interested in or thinking of using any of these technologies.
Recommend. A very helpful course if one is working on imaging, and a fun course if one is interested in microscopy.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I learned a great deal about microscopy, how it works, the different variables, and the different technologies, including super-resolution-microscopy, that are out there and available for use. This course has already contributed significantly to my research in that I am currently using a great deal of microscopy and will likely utilize some of the more advanced microscopy techniques the course goes into in the future.
my research involves microscopy and this course is very helpful to improve my knowledge and skills of microscopy
